content.question: A <math alttext="0.10 molar" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.10</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi></math> solution of a weak acid is titrated with <math alttext="0.10 molar N a O H, aqueous" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.10</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>NaOH</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>. Based on the titration curve above, which of the following could be the identity of the weak acid?

choices.label: <math alttext="H C N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>HCN</mi></math> with a <math alttext="K a " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub></math> value of <math alttext="5 times 10 to the negative 10 power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup></math>

<math alttext="H O C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>HOCl</mi></math> with a <math alttext="K a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub></math> value of <math alttext="3 times 10 to the negative 8 power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></msup></math>

<math alttext="C H 3 C H 2 C O O H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>CH</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msub><mi>CH</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>COOH</mi></math> with a <math alttext="K a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub></math> value of <math alttext="1 times 10 to the negative 5 power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></math>

<math alttext="C l C H 2 C O O H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ClCH</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>COOH</mi></math> with a <math alttext="K a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub></math> value of <math alttext="1 times 10 to the negative 3 power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="C H 3 C H 2 C O O H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>CH</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msub><mi>CH</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>COOH</mi></math> with a <math alttext="K a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub></math> value of <math alttext="1 times 10 to the negative 5 power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></math>

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
